Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

remarks.para: This class is provided as a means to differentiate between exceptions defined by the system versus exceptions defined by applications.

does not provide information as to the cause of the . In most scenarios, instances of this class should not be thrown. In cases where this class is instantiated, a human-readable message describing the error should be passed to the constructor.

is thrown by the common language runtime when errors occur that are nonfatal and recoverable by user programs. These errors result from failed runtime check (such as an array out-of-bound error), and can occur during the execution of any method. adds no new functionality to .
uses the HRESULT COR_E_SYSTEM, that has the value 0x80131501.
